definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The screen capture shows on the right an example of a task presentation.
sentences.chinese: 截图的右面显示了一个任务表示的示例。

sentences.english: Areas outlined in yellow delineate close-up views on the right.
sentences.chinese: 对黄框内区域的景观特写则呈现为右面的两张图片。

sentences.english: Also, the heavy use of white space allows the products to almost jump right off the page at you.
sentences.chinese: 很大空白空间的也允许商品在页面的右面展示出来。

sentences.english: Please write down your title of oral composition on the right of the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 请把你的作文题目写在黑板右面。

sentences.english: It must not look to the left or right but go forward.
sentences.chinese: 不能指望它盯着左面或着右面，还能往前走。

sentences.english: We enveloped the enemy on the right.
Lava is spilled to right and left, destroying forests and cities.
sentences.chinese: 岩浆往右面和左面喷洒，毁灭了森林和都会。

sentences.english: Request permission to divert20 miles right of track to avoid the thunderstorm( build-ups).
sentences.chinese: 请求向航迹右面改20海里避开雷雨。

sentences.english: The Kissing Camels formation is the nearest hogback on the right.
sentences.chinese: “亲吻的骆驼”是右面最近的豚脊丘。

sentences.english: These two postures are depicted on the right.
sentences.chinese: 这两张种姿势被描述在右面。

sentences.english: Not far away from the bridge was a six-storied building. To its right was a second-hand bookstore.
sentences.chinese: 离桥不远有一座六层楼房，楼房的右面是一家旧书店。

sentences.english: The priest proudly stepped over to the right.
The print on the right wall was given to us by our brother-in-law, Nick.
sentences.chinese: 右面墙上的印刷品是我们姐夫Nick给我们的。

sentences.english: Please refer to the right-hand column of page 200 of this dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 请参看这本词典第二百页右面一栏。

definition: left/the left side/to the left of
middle/center/right in the middle or center/nub
right in the midpoint/a bull's eye/to hit the nail on the head
